name: Leslie Gulch - Succor Creek
description:
Introduction

Popular and very beautiful drive-thru canyon on the southern end of Lake Owyhee. Optional side hikes:

  • Upper Leslie Gulch
  • Juniper Gulch - approach to Skyfall
  • Timber Gulch.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Camping is allegedly limited to Slocum Creek Campground near the boat ramp.

Beta sites

  • CanyoneeringNorthwest.com (archive.org)
